entry.title: Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Gift Card
Price: 25.00 - 125.00 (5 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a The Missing Piece Puzzle Company gift card.

Gift cards are delivered via email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

Gift cards will expire one year from purchase date, but who can wait that long to have a custom puzzle made?  I can't think of anyone, either!

Let's get your puzzle on....

entry.title: Extra Large Custom Photo Jigsaw Puzzle with 80 large pieces
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Wedding
Price: 44.99 - 49.99 (2 variants)

Our custom photo puzzles are the perfect way to tell your story and preserve memories. Our puzzle pieces are large, high-quality, and easy for little hands to handle. We can create a custom puzzle for any occasion.

This beautiful and large 80 piece puzzle features large puzzle pieces that capture memories.  Having an average size of 2 x 2 inches each, this puzzle has an approximate finished size of 16 x 20 inches when complete.  Thick durable puzzle pieces on a professional matte finish for a stunning puzzle of YOU.  

This puzzle features very large pieces that are easily handled and show great detail.  This is the perfect puzzle if you have older puzzlers who have vision problems or need larger puzzle pieces to handle.  

Makes a great gift for anyone on your list.

entry.title: Blank White Puzzle for a Unique Wedding Guest Book - 80 Puzzle Pieces (approx. 16 x 20)
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Missing Piece Puzzle Company
Type: Guest Book
Price: 29.99 - 34.99 (2 variants)

Blank White Puzzle Pieces come together to form the Perfect Wedding Guest Book or Guest Book for any special occasion. This extra-large bright white puzzle is approximately 16 x 20 inches when complete.  This elegant puzzle will fit wonderfully into a standard American Sized frame, as they are proudly MADE IN AMERICA.

Our 80 extra-large pieces are thick, sturdy, and durable, and feature a brilliant bright white covering that will provide enough room for your special guests to leave a very brief message and signature.  Our 80 piece puzzle features pieces that are an average size of 2 x 2 inches each and have a large surface area.  We hand-number each puzzle on the back as they are very challenging to assemble.

WRITING ON YOUR PUZZLE:  There are no special pens needed to sign our puzzles and we highly recommend using a regular ballpoint pen. Sharpies will also look amazing on the white puzzle pieces, and we recommend using the Sharpies with the larger tip.  Gel pens are not recommended.

A wonderful Unique Guest Book Puzzle for every occasion. Perfect for Baby Showers, Quincierna's, Bar & Bat Mitzvahs' and Sweet 16 parties!  Our puzzles are all Made In America with quality standards in mind and are easily framed because of their standard sizes.
